speaker: Jiří Pinkas
title: Spring Modulith a DDD
description: Domain Driven Design has been around for about 20 years. Now it has finally received better support in Spring in the form of Spring Modulith.

speaker: Peter Cipov
title: Hackers's diet
description: 50kg in 7 months, without training and going to the gym. Intermittent fasting, eating once a day with a low carbohydrate content (ketodiet).

speaker: Petr Filip
title: JSONata
description: An amazing declarative language for processing JSON even for non-programmers. It allows for aggregations, functions, simple scripting.
